column4: Hello .I very new to Ubuntu and have a beginner experience..It seems that I have a bug of the sort on the my system! My screens freezes every 2 minutes for at least 5 sec. This is really frustrating ! Any advise on how to make sure that my system never freezes up?

Hello .I very new to Ubuntu and have a beginner experience..It seems that I have a bug of the sort on the my system! My screens freezes every 2 minutes for at least 5 sec. This is really frustrating ! Any advise on how to make sure that my system never freezes up?    I checked the Gnome and there was not much that was taking up the memory
does it happen with all users?
